term.title: Morse potential

item.text: The empirical function relating the potential energy of a molecule to the inter-atomic distance r accounting for the anharmonicity (See: harmonic approximation) of bond stretching: E r = D e ( 1- e- a ( r- r e is the bond-dissociation energy, r e is the equilibrium bond length, and a is a parameter characteristic of a given molecule.
